title: Revise ocean-themed logo to communicate empowerment, growth, and market leadership

requirements.text: Create an updated ocean-themed brand logo concept that visually communicates empowerment, confident market entry/leadership ("we own the market"), upward growth to the top level, and being on the consumer’s side, while keeping the current premium/clean style.

quotes: stlye is good but we want Meaning of Empowerment in this ocean like this kind of loge its also identy of we are coming this market and we own the market like this kind of meaning logo we want we grow up up we complete with top level  and we always with consumer side

acceptanceCriteria: Updated logo visuals clearly incorporate an ocean identity (e.g., wave/sea forms) plus an unmistakable upward/leadership cue (e.g., rising crest, arrow, peak, lighthouse, etc.) without becoming overly complex.
Logo remains premium/clean and readable at small sizes (header height ~32–40px).
Color/contrast remains suitable on the site header/footer backgrounds (no loss of legibility).

requirements.text: Update the site to use the new logo assets consistently in the header and footer by changing the image src paths currently pointing to /assets/generated/premium-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png to the newly generated empowerment logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo renders correctly and does not overflow the existing max-width constraints.
Footer logo renders correctly and matches the header logo (same asset/lockup).
No broken image links in header/footer on hard refresh.

requirements.text: Update SEO/logo metadata to match the new brand logo asset(s): update Organization structured data logo URL and the index.html Open Graph/Twitter image URL to use the new generated logo/social image asset.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredData.tsx uses the new logo image filename for the Organization "logo" field.
frontend/index.html og:image and twitter:image reference the new generated social logo image filename.
After build, the referenced assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and load successfully in the browser.

requirements.text: Ensure all newly generated logo image assets are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly as static assets (no backend involvement).
acceptanceCriteria: All new/updated logo images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
No frontend code attempts to fetch logo images from the backend canister.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister; do not add additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding new backend APIs or persistence.
Changing site sections/content beyond what is required to swap logo assets and SEO metadata.
Introducing third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity only).

required: Ocean-themed premium logo social image, wide composition, clean vector-like shapes, transparent or solid background as appropriate (ocean-empowerer-solutions-logo-empowerment.dim_512x256.png)
edits: Empowerment-focused ocean identity with an upward growth/leadership cue; keep premium minimal geometry and deep navy + subtle metallic gold accent (premium-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png > premium-logo-horizontal-empowerment.dim_512x128.png)
Matching square icon variant with the same ocean empowerment mark; strong legibility at small sizes (premium-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png > premium-logo-icon-empowerment.dim_256x256.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
